description: Try our easy to follow Sunrise Smoothie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frapp√©,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Raspberry,Back to school,Sesame free,Budget,Banana,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Mango,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Sunrise Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blend 2 cups milk, mango, banana and cauliflower in a blender for 2 minutes or until smooth and combined. Divide half the mixture between 4 serving glasses.
Add 3/4 of the raspberries and remaining milk to the blender and blend for 1 minute or until combined. Carefully pour into glasses and top with remaining raspberries to serve.
